body:
Okay so I'm making a montage coming soon and I'm going to be recording footage veeeeeery soon. And guess what:

15 fps isn't cutting it.

So I need some new recording software that's free and doesn't butcher my fps too too much (anything that'll run me about 30 fps is fine). 

Anyone have suggestions?

replies.body:
I use Mirillis Action (It's not free, I'm not encouraging piracy or anything though)
It's very lag free, especially if you use the region selection mode, it's like you get no framedrop. The demo version has all the features of the normal one, except it lasts for 30 days and you get a watermark.
